sen.j: あやべ温泉（あやべおんせん）とは、京都府綾部市にある温泉である。
sen.e: Ayabe-onsen Hotspring is located in Ayabe City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Ayabe-onsen Hotspring is located in Ayabe City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Ayabe-onsen Hotspring is located in Ayabe City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 舞鶴若狭自動車道綾部インターチェンジから中丹広域農道・福井県道・京都府道1号小浜綾部線経由で約30分。
sen.e: It takes approx. 30 minutes by car from the Ayabe interchange of Maizuru Wakasa Expressway, via Chutan Koiki Nodo (a road for the wide agricultural area of Chutan), the Fukui Prefectural road and the Obama Ayabe route of Kyoto Prefectural road 1.

It takes approx. 30 minutes by car from the Ayabe interchange of Maizuru Wakasa Expressway, via Chutan Koiki Nodo (a road for the wide agricultural area of Chutan), the Fukui Prefectural road and the Obama Ayabe route of Kyoto Prefectural road 1.

It takes approx. thirty minutes by car from the Ayabe Interchange of Maizuru Wakasa Expressway, via Chutan Koiki Nodo (a road for the wide agricultural area of Chutan), the Obama Ayabe Line of the Fukui Prefectural Route/Kyoto Prefectural Route 1.
sen.cmt: 福井県道・京都府道1号小浜綾部線の表現を変更しました。

sen.j: あやべ市民バスにあやべ温泉への直通便がある。
sen.e: Aya Bus provided a through service to Ayabe-onsen Hotspring.
Aya Bus provided a through service to Ayabe-onsen Hotspring.
Aya Bus provides a through service to Ayabe-onsen Hotspring.
However, you must make a reservation to ride on the bus.
However, you must make a reservation to ride on the bus.
However, you must make a reservation to ride on the bus.

tit.cmt: 他の記事と統一しました。

tit.j: ナトリウム－炭酸水素塩泉
tit.e: The water includes natrium and bicarbonate.
The water includes natrium and bicarbonate.
The water includes natrium and bicarbonate.

sen.e: The water temperature of the hotspring source: aprox. 18.6 ℃.
The water temperature of the hotspring source: aprox. 18.6 ℃.
The water temperature of the hotspring source: approximately 18.6 degrees Celsius.

sen.j: 湧出量 約12.6リットル／分
sen.e: The rate of water flowing out of the hotspring source: approx. 2.6 litters/minute
The rate of water flowing out of the hotspring source: approx. 2.6 litters/minute
The rate of water flowing out of the hotspring source: approx. 12.6 litters/minute

sen.j: 水素イオン指数 約8.1
sen.e: pH: approx. 8.1
pH: approx. 8.1
pH: approx. 8.1
The hotspring facilities
The hotspring facilities
The hotspring facilities

sen.j: 綾部市との第3セクターである株式会社緑土（りょくど）が運営する。
sen.e: It is operated by the Ryokudo company, a so-called third sector cooperation which is partially funded by Ayabe City.
It is operated by the Ryokudo company, a so-called third sector cooperation which is partially funded by Ayabe City.
It is operated by the Ryokudo company, a so-called third sector cooperation which is partially funded by Ayabe City.

sen.j: 施設名の「二王」というのは、この温泉の近所にある国宝、光明寺二王門からつけられた。
sen.e: "Nio," the name of the facilities, is given after the Nio-mon gate of Komyo-ji Temple, a national treasure, which is located near to the hotspring.
"Nio," the name of the facilities, is given after the Nio-mon gate of Komyo-ji Temple, a national treasure, which is located near to the hotspring.
Nio,' the name of the facilities, is given after the Nio-mon gate of Komyo-ji Temple, a national treasure, which is located near the hotspring.

sen.j: 住所 - 京都府綾部市睦寄町在ノ向10
sen.e: Address: Zainomukai 10, Mutsuyori Cho, Ayabe City, Kyoto Prefecture
